item.description:
User Summary

This is a catch-all entry for various promo cards that have been handed out at various cons, release events and by MiB and Pegasus Supporters. These cards are not released with any set and are/were only available as promotional items at events. Some of the English cards are also included as freebies in orders from Warehouse 23, the Steve Jackson Games online store.

Part of the Munchkin series.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
